Title: Relates to schemes to defraud and establishing the crime of harassment of a legal services client; repealer
Summary: Restructures the crimes of schemes to defraud; establishes the crime of harassment of a legal services client.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, the general business law and the labor law, in relation to schemes to defraud and establishing the crime of harassment of a legal services client; and to repeal certain provisions of the penal law relating thereto
